Overview:
       

This course will show how progressive companies are transforming their business at a low cost and with a high return on investment (ROI) by implementing Business Process Management (BPM), and Business Process Optimization (BPO) solutions that improve their workflow and performance. These solutions provide:
Performance metrics dashboards for real-time visibility into the business performance, showing how well each process is performing
          Automatic alerts that proactively notify you when corrective actions are needed
          Automation of manual tasks for increased productivity
          Automatic enforcement of business rules to ensure compliance
          Essential insight for continuous improvement and business process optimization
          The course presents technology options and best practices for implementing such solutions along with real-life examples of their successful implementations by leading utilities and Independent System Operators (ISOs). It shows what BPM/BPO is, what it isn’t, and what you need to know to facilitate BPM/BPO in your company.
Who Should Attend
The subjects covered in this course are of broad interest to all those involved with improving performance and compliance of utilities and ISOs. You will benefit from attending this workshop if you are responsible for, or involved in the items mentioned below:
Utility Operations
          Improving Business Processes
          Business Process Modeling & Re-Engineering
          T&D and Plant Operations
          Maintenance Management
          Work Management & Mobile Dispatch
          Power Markets & Power Procurement
          Construction Management
          Transmission Markets
          Customer Care/Customer Service
          Energy Efficiency and Demand Response
          Metering, Settlement, Billing
          Utility IT
          Business Process Management
          Workflow Applications
          Enterprise Application Integration (EAI)
          IT Governance
